name: Taken Away
short_desc: Taken Away is a non-linear strategic horror game. Following a car "accident", you have been abducted. Explore your surroundings, don't get caught, and figure out a way to escape if you don't want to perish in a gruesome death.

You've been pushing your luck for too long down here. As you walk to exit this place you once called home, your urge becomes a reality.

name: For Those We Forgot
short_desc: In this first person psychological horror game your concept of what is real will be questioned over and over again while you venture in this old apparently abandoned apartment. Be careful at every corner and every shadow, things may not be what they seem.

name: The Veiled Ones
short_desc: The Veiled Ones is a horror stealth game about a Muslim exorcist trying to save his son from a jinn possession. In this game players will reveal the story behind their son's possession, while avoiding the jinn that haunts them.

name: Usual
short_desc: Enjoy the quiet life in the Japanese countryside. You can relax and spend your time doing some housework.„ÄÄA walk around the neighborhood and relaxing on the sofa in the sunlight will help you recover from the daily grind.

name: FURRY BACKROOMS Demo
short_desc: FURRY BACKROOMS is a cooperative game for a group of 1-8 players that combines the best ideas from the BACKROOMS and FURRY universes. Single mode is also available. You have to survive and find a way out before the FURRY catches up with you. Updates and various interesting things await you...

name: VICE: PROLOGUE
short_desc: She is not satisfied. She believes that a 'perfect' world is ugly, lacking of tragic beauty. He is curious. He holds all that is 'wrong' behind a mirrored illusion on the screen of his TV. Wouldn't it be so fun to have these two opposing views collide into one? For the sake of knowledge, of course.

name: The Temple of Children
short_desc: The Temple of Children is a story-driven horror adventure about a simple little girl from a Russian province. Against her will she became part of horrible events, watching her reality turn into hell. To survive she needs to unravel the secret that children are hiding.

name: Death From The Darkness
short_desc: "Death From The Darkness" is a hardcore horror game in which you have to survive in harsh conditions in a fight with an ancient vampire. Hints are minimal; you have to be alert and use your wits to survive.

name: Dark Days
short_desc: A Supernatural Thriller from the indie creators of "White Night" and ‚ÄúUnder The Waves‚Äù now remastered for PC gamers.

name: Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden Demo
The Immemorial Order
short_desc: After living in your new house for a few months, you discover the previous owners have left behind some items that were never meant to be found.

name: PARASiTE FLOWER
short_desc: PARASiTE FLOWER is a beautiful yet disturbing side scroller game where you slowly uncover the story of Ari.

name: A Jornada de Vanildo Legacy Edition
short_desc: Vanildo‚Äôs Journey Legacy Edition is a collector's edition, basically exclusive to those who purchased the original game, that is, before it became free to play.

name: New Heaven
short_desc: In this first-person shooter (FPS) adventure set in the wake of a devastating meteor shower, players needs to survive waves of zombies and upgrade their equipement with the points they made while killing zombies. good luck and have fun :)

name: The Fear Business
short_desc: A survival horror mixed with found footage elements. Unveil the secrets of a dark satanic cult and solve the Solomon Manor puzzles while hiding from the deadly Goat Face.

name: House of 1000 Traps
short_desc: While carrying out your usual heist, you end up locked in a house filled to the roof with traps with a serial killer ready to stab you in the neck with his butcher knife. Be stealthy and get what you came here for, and find a way out!

short_desc: This DLC adds an entire new map layer, under the existing lands, with Dwarves, a new Evil race and a new giant god-thing. Grow your horrific creature across the map, assisted by two new agents and new ways to expand your orcs and Deep Ones.

name: The Walls

With the world in chaos, it seems like it's down to you and your team of scientists to get to the bottom of it.

name: Hive In Space
short_desc: You must overcome the anomalies occurring in space.

short_desc: The game has a tricky story and multiple endings that confuse you. But you have an opportunity to figure out what is happening by playing two main characters. Be aware; each character tells you their side story. None of the storytellers are bad characters in their stories. You are the BEST JUDGE!!!

short_desc: The game has a tricky story that confuses you. But you have an opportunity to figure out what is happening. You will play three main characters in the game to understand the story. short_desc: A touching story of a young programmer Alexey. One day he meets a girl through a joke site, but who would have thought that Alexei would not be laughing at all. Take a pack of sushi rolls, saddle a snowmobile and go on a long journey to your princess.

short_desc: A roguelike FPS game, focusing on gun customization and fast gameplay. Survive the zombie apocalypse, and possibly end it.

short_desc: Shatter Keep is an asymmetrical multiplayer game where 3 survivor players try to escape the castle and 1 player attempts to eliminate them. Survivors must complete a list of objectives to open the castle exits while arming traps, lighting torches and avoiding the monster before the timer expires.

name: Network
